SEARCH
Package com.platform.auth.internal

Class TokenMetadata

java.lang.Object
com.platform.auth.internal.TokenMetadata
@Entity public class TokenMetadata extends Object
TokenMetadata entity for secure session and opaque token management. Implements the constitutional requirement for opaque tokens (no JWT).
